.. _list_of_fields:

Fields that can be included with the ``-f`` option
==================================================

.. list-table::
   :widths: 25 75
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Name 
     - Meaning
   * - release_version
     - Release version of the allele
   * - allele_description_ref
     - Unique reference to the allele description, in standardized form (Repo:Label:Version)
   * - aliases
     - Alternative names for this sequence
   * - locus
     - Gene Locus (e.g. IGH)
   * - chromosome
     - Chromosome (e.g. 14)
   * - sequence_type
     - Sequence type (e.g. V)
   * - functional
     - Functional (T/F)
   * - species
     - Binomial designation of subject's species
   * - species_subgroup
     - Race, strain or other species subgroup to which this subject belongs
   * - species_subgroup_type
     - Identifier of the gene subgroup or clade, as (and if) defined
   * - gene_designation
     - Gene number or other identifier, as (and if) defined
   * - allele_designation
     - Allele number or other identifier, as (and if) defined
   * - allele_similarity_cluster_designation
     - ID of the similarity cluster used in this germline set, if designated
   * - allele_similarity_cluster_member_id 
     - ID of the similarity cluster member used in this germline set, if designated
   * - paralogs
     - Labels of paralogs, if any
   * - curational_tags
     - Tags used to indicate curational status
   * - gs_release_version
     - Release version of the germline set
   * - gs_germline_set_name
     - Name of the germline set
   * - gs_germline_set_ref
     - Unique reference to the germline set, in standardized form (Repo:Label:Version)
